doc:
Michèle Morgan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mich%C3%A8le_Morgan 0 Michèle Morgan (French: [miʃɛl mɔʁɡan]; 29 February 1920 – 20 December 2016) was a French film actress, who was a leading lady for three decades in both French cinema and Hollywood features. She is considered to have been one of the great French actresses of the 20th century. Morgan was the inaugural winner of the Best Actress Award at the Cannes Film Festival. In 1992, she was given an honorary César Award for her contributions to French cinema. Michèle_Morgan ( French : [_miʃɛl_mɔʁɡan_] ; 29_February_1920 – 20_December_2016 ) was a_French_film_actress , who was a_leading_lady for three_decades in both_French_cinema and Hollywood_features . She is_considered_to_have_been one of the_great_French_actresses of the_20th_century . Morgan was the_inaugural_winner of the_Best_Actress_Award at the_Cannes_Film_Festival . In 1992 , she was_given an_honorary_César_Award for her_contributions to French_cinema .
